findings.liver: Heterogeneous enhancement; no suspicious enhancing masses
findings.biliary: No intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary duct dilation; fluid-fluid level suggestive of biliary sludge
findings.pancreas: Peripancreatic stranding consistent with known pancreatitis; no pancreatic duct dilatation; no peripancreatic fluid collections; hyperintensities observed in the neck and tail of pancreas
findings.spleen: Normal in size and signal intensity
findings.adrenal glands: Normal in size and signal intensity
findings.kidneys: 10 mm lesion in left kidney with central enhancement; bilateral renal cysts noted
